Set up Dash nodes easily

Dashmate is a universal tool designed to help you set up and run Dash nodes in a containerized environment. It is also an ideal tool to quickly and easily set up and run a development network on your local system

Try it now

How does it work?

Dashmate features automated configuration and startup through a user-friendly command line interface (CLI) written in Node.js.

Initial setup wizard

Includes support for testnet, devnets and local networks.

Configuration management system

Allows you to configure any of the hundreds of available settings, while still suggesting sensible defaults

Simple one-line commands

Start, stop, restart, reset and upgrade masternodes and full nodes.

Support for multiple nodes and networks

Helps developers new to Dash Platform get started quickly

Numerous status commands with detailed output

Includes the host machine, core, platform, masternode and Docker status

Get started with Dashmate today

Fully open source

Self-documenting help system

Helpful and user-friendly error messages

Try it now
